http://www.nbxsoft.com/screen-recorder.php Figured Id throw this up here since it took me a good half hour to find a good ACTUAL FREE recorder. for anyone interested in recording their endeavors.. works pretty well for me, and Is ACTUALLY free.... No watermarks, etc. May try to get you to buy it at some point, but as far as I can tell it shouldn't. make sure you set it to X-vid, otherwise the files are HUGE.

PS: found that it won't record KSP for some reason. Does record everything else.. Not sure the cause.

Edited July 26, 2014 by Talavar
I got myself Bandicam and so far it works really well across many game genres.
I've used Open Broadcaster Software successfully with KSP. It is free, not too hard to figure out, and didn't slow the game down much.
Seeing as this ain't about KSP at all, really, I'll move it over to the Space Lounge.

I settled on OBS as well. It's best to check out some tutorial/setup vids on youtube as the interface is not as intuitive as it could be. You're all set to go within about 10min and it doesn't slap down your framerate, that I can tell. Make sure you're matching bitrate to your resolution or it can look really bad, which is probably why it's not as popular as it should be.

if you are using AMD platform

use AMD's Raptr
Brah, I go OBS all the way.
